text: You staunchly refuse to labor for a tyrant and make your stance clear on not working without seeing gold first. At this remark the greedy man before you bursts out with righteous outrage “What? You want gold! You have been who knows where for the past 4 days and you are asking me about pay! No, that's it. You’re fired, and good riddance too I say, even Ypsaton is a better employee than you are.” At this your Ex-Boss sweeps you out of the Tavern, the one at which you were formerly employed, and slams the door locking it behind you. You can still hear him angrily mutter to himself as he walks out the side door to the tavern and storms his way down the road to the city, presumably to report your current state of employment, fired.

exit.trigger: your hearts burns with the fires of Vengeance at this tavern owners insolence
prove to yourself that you have what it takes to be the best in the business
